title: Divya Chandrika: Diamond & Gemstone Bridal Haaram with Golden Pearls
materials: Cultured Golden South Sea Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This breathtaking haaram features a layered design, combining geometric patterns with ornate floral motifs. The central pendant showcases a teardrop ruby cabochon surrounded by sparkling diamonds and emerald accents. The necklace is punctuated by lustrous golden South Sea pearls, adding a touch of timeless elegance. Intricate filigree work throughout the design adds depth and sophistication.
occasions: Perfect for a grand Indian wedding (Vivahaalu)
Bharatanatyam). Also suitable for high-end cultural events.
description: This haaram is a masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, blending traditional design elements with modern sensibilities. The use of high-quality gemstones and lustrous South Sea pearls ensures a piece that will be cherished for generations. The meticulous detailing and Hyderabadi polish elevate its aesthetic appeal, making it a true statement piece and a valuable addition to any bridal trousseau. A testament to timeless beauty and cultural heritage.
